tagline: A Mortal Developer With Immortal Dreams
bio: Self-taught Full Stack Developer | OSS Lover | CLI Enthusiast | Student Developer passionate about coding, electronics, and badminton

contents.title: MANGA-CLI
contents.description: CLI tool to fetch and read manga in the comfort of your terminal. Download manga as PDFs with an awesome command-line interface.

contents.title: AVOID-SHAME
contents.description: Clever JavaScript tool for avoiding console shaming by detecting and filtering console logs. Protects your code from unwanted console.log statements.

contents.title: SET-YEAR
contents.description: Time-travel your Git history! CLI tool to set your commit history back to any year you want. Perfect for GitHub contribution graph customization.

contents.title: REMOVE-COMMENT
contents.description: Automated tool for removing comments from your codebase. Clean up your code directory with this simple CLI application.

contents.title: ASCII-HEADER
contents.description: Generate beautiful ASCII art headers for your code files. Add stylish banners and documentation headers with figlet-powered ASCII fonts.

contents.title: WEB-ENV-MANAGE
contents.description: Desktop application for managing environment variables across web projects. Built with Electron for cross-platform support on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

contents.title: IS-CONVENTIONAL
contents.description: Validate commit messages against conventional commit standards. Ensures your Git commits follow best practices and conventions.

contents.title: How to setup login password for raspberry pi
contents.description: Tutorial on setting up login password security for Raspberry Pi. Essential security configuration for embedded Linux systems.

contents.title: Full bridge rectifier
contents.description: Building a full bridge rectifier circuit for AC to DC conversion. Essential electronics project for power supply design.

contents.title: How to make a simple amplifier using lm386
contents.description: Building a simple audio amplifier circuit using the LM386 IC. Perfect beginner project for audio electronics.

contents.title: How to make your own portable boom box
contents.description: DIY portable boom box project with speakers and amplifier. Build your own custom audio system from scratch.

contents.title: How to control servo motor using raspberry pi
contents.description: Control servo motors with Raspberry Pi GPIO pins. Learn PWM control and servo motor interfacing for robotics projects.

contents.title: How to make a mini portable class D stereo amplifier
contents.description: Build a compact Class D stereo amplifier for portable audio applications. High-efficiency amplifier design tutorial.

contents.title: Overcharging protection circuit
contents.description: Battery overcharge protection circuit design. Essential safety circuit for lithium-ion battery charging systems.

contents.title: Bluetooth Switch
contents.description: Wireless switch controlled via Bluetooth from a smartphone app. Built with an ESP32 and relay module for home automation applications.

contents.title: DIY Voting Machine
contents.description: An electronic voting machine prototype built with Arduino. Features secure voting, candidate selection, and vote counting capabilities.

contents.title: NAS Server
contents.description: A Network Attached Storage server built with a Raspberry Pi and external hard drives. Provides centralized file storage and media streaming capabilities.

contents.title: Portable Power Bank
contents.description: Custom power bank with multiple USB outputs and battery level indicators. Built with 18650 lithium-ion cells and a power management module.

contents.title: Smart Band Prototype
contents.description: Wearable fitness tracker prototype with step counting, heart rate monitoring, and smartphone notifications. Built with ESP32 and various sensors.

contents.title: Wireless Access Point
contents.description: Custom wireless access point with external antennas for extended range. Based on OpenWRT firmware with custom configurations.

contents.title: DIY LED Lamp
contents.description: Custom LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Features touch controls and a minimalist design.

timeline.event: First tinkering with electronics - Discovered the magic of circuits and components
Deep dive into electronics & embedded systems - Fascinated by military and defense applications
Explored history - Broadened perspective beyond technology
Returned to electronics - Started building fun and creative hardware projects
Joined GitHub - Started coding journey and open source contributions
Mastered embedded systems - Arduino, ESP32, and IoT projects
Jumped into software engineering - Full-stack web development journey begins
Published CLI tools & reached 100+ repositories - Active open source developer
Attended JS World Conference USA - Expanding horizons in web technologies
300+ repositories milestone - Balancing hardware and software expertise
Learning Data Science - Exploring ML, AI, and data analytics for the future

certificates.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
